text: I know my mom said as early as she can remember letting me watch TV, my one treat a week when I was like 6 was to stay up and watch 'Saturday Night Live.'
author: Rashida Jones

text: I want to be as healthy as I can because I'm a mom now.
author: Jessica Simpson

text: I have so much respect for my mom and all the women across the world.
author: Jessica Simpson

text: I guess now that I think back, I used to play priest and be a funny priest. I don't know, I grew up in such a Catholic family that I kind of liked to test the boundaries a little bit and I think I had fun watching my mom laugh.
author: Jenny McCarthy

text: When I was a little girl, rocking my little dolls, I remember thinking I would be the world's best mom, and so far I've done it.
author: Jenny McCarthy
